body:
1. It does allow varying shapes. `tf.layers.batch_normalization(x)` only require x to have known channel.

2. Doing the update internally can be significantly slower in certain cases, due to the dependency it introduced. So I think the current API is a reasonable choice. Though I don't mind seeing a new API which does the update internally so it's more friendly to beginners.
